name: SEQUEL blight
description:
SEQUEL blight is the first game of the "Sequel" series, following the story of the player alongside four main characters: Rabi, Uula, Nyx, and Tirma. It was first released on March 1 of 2017, and last updated on July 15 of the same year.

The story takes place in the Vaeltria continent, in a world where humans and monsters fight to get a resource that is running short as time passes, mana, the source of all life. Humans were significantly affected by this shortage, as human males, a natural source of mana, started decreasing in number due to their poor affinity with mana. As a consequence of these events, adventurers and organizations began searching all around the continent for an alternative source that could return peace to the world.
